mapper.select: select id from admin where id=#{id} and passwd=#{passwd}
select idx, name, seat_max, price, preview from theater order by name
select * from theater_sit order by name
select nvl(max(idx),100) from theater where idx>100
mapper.update: update theater set idx=#{idx}, name= #{name}, seat_max= #{max}, seat_out= 0, price= #{price}, preview= #{preview} where name= #{primaryName}
update theater_sit set idx= #{idx}, seat_row= #{rows}, seat_col= #{cols}, name= #{name} where name= #{primaryName}
mapper.select: select * from movie order by idx
select * from theater_sit_empty order by idx

SELECT theater_idx, start_time, movie_idx, empty_sit, m.title title, m.IMG_URL img_url, m.runtime runtime FROM screen_info si, movie m WHERE start_time > to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND to_date(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd') > start_time and theater_idx=#{idx} AND movie_idx= m.idx order by start_time
mapper.insert: insert into screen_info values(#{theater_idx}, to_date(#{start_time}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{movie_idx}, #{empty_sit})
